user_query: Help me create a hilarious meme for my friends' game night. Generate a Drake Likes and Hates meme with the texts 'This is epic!' and 'This is a disaster.' Also, find a random chuck joke in the category 'fun'.

TaskList.description: Generate the 'Likes' side of the Drake meme with the text 'This is epic!'.
Generate the 'Hates' side of the Drake meme with the text 'This is a disaster.'.
Combine the generated 'Likes' and 'Hates' images into a single meme format.
Fetch a random chuck joke in the category 'fun'.
